snippet.title: Tactical Roguelike Deckbuilder LONESTAR Coming to Steam on January 18!
snippet.description:
Turn-based strategic roguelike deckbuilder LONESTAR set to release on #Steam on January 18, 2024, with a 10% launch discount!
Wishlist NOW👉 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2056210/LONESTAR/

LONESTAR is a strategic Roguelike spaceship deckbuilder. As a bounty hunter, you will capture criminals scattered across the universe. Win shockwave battles to gain rewards and vacations. Find treasures, customize spaceships, unlock talents, defeat the felons and be a legend!

⭐ Explore diverse combat styles and strategies with 2 unique Spaceships. 
⭐ Personalize your Spaceship with 170+ powerful Units.
⭐ Create numerous combinations using a collection of 140+ Treasures.
⭐ Recruit from a pool of 35 skilled pilots to boost your bounty-hunting journey. (More distinct pilots are on the way!)
⭐ Take on challenges of 8 difficulty levels!
⭐ Pursue nearly 100 wanted criminals, including 15 extremely dangerous boss-level felons! Please make sure to adapt your combat strategies accordingly.
⭐ Introducing Boss Rush Mode: Will you emerge victorious in a five-round showdown against the toughest enemies with your build of the hour?
